name: My Furry Stepmom 🐾
description:
My Furry Stepmom is yet another short novel in "My Furry" series, which tells a story about a guy who works as an actor. One day he is offered to take part in a unusual movie, where he has to play a role of a stepson. Our hero agrees, so at the film set he meets a girl named Mila, who plays the role of his stepmom. After some interactions with each other and several days spend together, they start to feel something deep within their hearts...

My Furry Stepmom is a comedy story about love, carrier goals and film shooting. Spend some time together with Mila and discover what it feels like to be an actor!

FEATURES:
• About 2-3 hours of content.
• Unique comedy story.
• Relaxing atmosphere.
• Some personal drama, as usual.
